General.Name: Ideal Bike
General.Description: Ideal Bike Corporation manufactures and sells bicycles and related parts in China. It offers indoor and outdoor sports vehicles, baby carriages, mini scooters, and their accessories. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

2.Name: Ms. Julia  Lai
2.Title: CFO, VP of Admin. Division & Corp. Governance Officer

3.Name: Ms. Vanna  Huang
3.Title: Associate VP of Sales Department & Sr. Mang. of Sales Division

4.Name: Mr. Darren  Wu
4.Title: Chief Plant Mang. of manufacturing division
